alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Monroe; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 10:45PM CDT until July 28 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MONROE...WAPELLO AND SOUTHEASTERN MAHASKA COUNTIES... At 1044 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eddyville, or 9 miles south of Oskaloosa, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Oskaloosa Municipal Airport around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Kirkville, Chillicothe, Ottumwa Industrial Airport, Ottumwa, Agency and Eldon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
